name: Super Shotgun Man 3D
description:
Tony Supra is a lazy, middle-aged ne'er-do-well with a love for cheap food, beer, and bar-fighting. When mobsters threaten to shut down every pizzeria in the city of Brooksdale, Tony goes on a rampage, arming himself with one of the gangster's own shotguns. From then on, he swears that he will keep killing gangsters until pizza is safe once again.

Programming, Sound, Music, Design - James "Air Man" Lillicrap
Character Art, UI, Design - Michael Willner

Special thanks to Alex Ziolkowski for environment texturework.

Can you find all 6 secrets?

Note:
This is a prototype of a demo for a game.  We're still working on it (more specifically texturing/lighting the environment, implementing more sounds/voices, and adding level boundaries), so expect more updates!
